name: Son of a Gecko
description:
“Son of a Gecko is a 3D Top-Down Shooter where the player plays as Captain Daudini a 17th century lizard pirate that can blast away enemies with his trusty flintlock pistol and dynamite found throughout the island to achieve his goal of getting the alcohol back from the Hippo Lord Alberts prohibition.”

Designers

Hayden McCormack

David Caruso

Astro Alessi

Alex Dabkowski

Stephen Blake

Artists

Joaquin Gundry

Joshua McAlister

Sol Blackshaw

William Saunders

Christopher Matthews

Programmers

Daniel Woodhouse

Ryan Horwood

Feedback Forms: 

If you happen to play a demo, we would love to hear from you. Provided below are some feedback forms that should only take a couple of minutes to complete. Your feedback is super appreciated.
